newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ population 3.719 mln at March 31 - SNZ.
newsitem.headline: NZ population 3.719 mln at March 31 - SNZ.

text.p: The total population in New Zealand at March 31, 1997, was provisionally estimated to have been 3.719 million, Statistics New Zealand said on Friday.
"During the 1997 March quarter there was an increase in population of only 1,200 persons," SNZ said.
"This resulted from a natural increase of 8,100 and a net emigration (excess of departures over arrivals) of 6,900."
SNZ said the smaller population increase during the 1997 March quarter compared with previous years resulted mainly from a higher net outflow in external migration.
